gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.title: MMD Skin - Settings
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.opengl_lighting: Enable OpenGL lighting effects for better visuals
Maximum cached model count, auto-cleanup when exceeded
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.gpu_skinning.to: Use GPU for skinning calculation, greatly improves performance for high-poly models (requires OpenGL 4.3+, restart required)
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.gpu_morph.toolt: Use GPU for vertex morph calculation (expressions, etc.), improves performance for models with many morphs (requires OpenGL 4.3+, restart required)
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.max_bones.toolt: Maximum bone count for GPU skinning (512-4096), increase for complex models (restart required)
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.toon_enabled.to: Enable cartoon rendering effect (cel shading, outlines, rim lighting)
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.toon_levels.too: Number of lighting levels (2-5), higher values create smoother transitions
Rim light sharpness (1-10), higher values create sharper edges
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.toon_shadow.too: Shadow color (purple tint is anime style)
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.toon_outline.to: Add outline stroke effect to the model
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_gravity: Gravity acceleration (higher = heavier hair, faster falling)
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_fps.too: Physics simulation framerate (30-120), higher = more accurate but more CPU intensive
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_substep: Maximum substeps per frame, prevents physics explosion during lag
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_solver_: Constraint solver iterations (4-16), higher = more accurate but slower
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_linear_: Linear damping scale, increase for slower/smoother hair movement
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_angular: Angular damping scale, increase for slower/more stable hair rotation
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_mass_sc: Mass multiplier, increase for heavier hair with more inertia
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_linear_: Reduce for less bouncy, more natural hair
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_inertia: How much hair is dragged when character moves (0=none, 100=normal)
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_max_lin: Velocity limit to prevent physics explosion
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_max_ang: Angular velocity limit to prevent physics explosion
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_joints_: Disable to let hair fall apart (for debugging)
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_bust_en: Use separate physics parameters for bust rigid bodies
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_bust_li: Bust linear damping scale, increase for slower bust movement
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_bust_an: Bust angular damping scale, increase for slower bust rotation
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_bust_ma: Bust mass multiplier, increase for heavier bust
gui.mmdskin.mod_settings.physics_bust_li: Bust stretch recovery force, needs higher values to maintain shape
